name: Invasion (itch) (Novacaine)
description:
Invasion is an arcade, side-scrolling shooter. Earth is being invaded by aliens through portals, you are the only one who can protect the earth or die trying.

Play as Artemis - A psychic that wields huge comic scissors and needles for weapons.
Use your powers to defend the earth and hold off the impending alien invasion

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Throw Scissors (General Attack)
F - Melee (Meleeing a orange flashing enemy causes all enemies in the area to be destroyed and heals the player to full health )
